law.catch_line: If, within 10 days after receipt of a notice and demand for payment of a sales and use tax assessmen...

text.section: If, within 10 days after receipt of a notice and demand for payment of a sales and use tax assessment that is final, a person or governmental unit fails to comply with the demand, the Comptroller shall assess a penalty of 25% of the unpaid assessment.
The penalty under subsection (a) of this section is in addition to the penalty provided under § 13-701 of this subtitle.
